00032 #ifndef I_DODSRequestHandlerList_h
00033 #define I_DODSRequestHandlerList_h 1
00034 
00035 #include <map>
00036 #include <string>
00037 
00038 using std::map ;
00039 using std::string ;
00040 
00041 #include "DODSDataHandlerInterface.h"
00042 
00043 class DODSRequestHandler ;
00044 
00052 class DODSRequestHandlerList {
00053 private:
00054     static DODSRequestHandlerList *     _instance ;
00055     map< string, DODSRequestHandler * > _handler_list ;
00056 protected:
00057                                 DODSRequestHandlerList(void) {}
00058 public:
00059     virtual                     ~DODSRequestHandlerList(void) {}
00060 
00061     typedef map< string, DODSRequestHandler * >::const_iterator Handler_citer ;
00062     typedef map< string, DODSRequestHandler * >::iterator Handler_iter ;
00063 
00064     virtual bool                add_handler( string handler_name,
00065                                          DODSRequestHandler * handler ) ;
00066     virtual DODSRequestHandler *remove_handler( string handler_name ) ;
00067     virtual DODSRequestHandler *find_handler( string handler_name ) ;
00068 
00069     virtual Handler_citer       get_first_handler() ;
00070     virtual Handler_citer       get_last_handler() ;
00071 
00072     virtual string              get_handler_names() ;
00073 
00074     virtual void                execute_each( DODSDataHandlerInterface &dhi ) ;
00075     virtual void                execute_all( DODSDataHandlerInterface &dhi ) ;
00076     virtual void                execute_once( DODSDataHandlerInterface &dhi ) ;
00077 
00078     static DODSRequestHandlerList *TheList() ;
00079 };
